openGraph.title: Euromoney
openGraph.description: Featurist built an API and semantic markup editor for Euromoney in 2013.

quote.text: The team we hired from Featurist were dedicated professionals and expert developers. Their commitment to quality and mature approach to Behaviour Driven Development was instrumental in getting a critical project off to a good start and invaluable in maintaining quality over time. Their high standards were also a great help in our recruitment process.
quote.author: Ben Jones, Euromoney / CTO
